oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Fire Department Station No. 3, c.1960s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the Nashville Fire Deparment Station No. 3 under construction. The Nashville Housing Authority sold the lot on which the fire station currently sits to the City of Nashville in 1958. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority, c.1960s. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.); Nashville (Tenn.). Fire Department. Engine company 3;
